ekshiksha.vclab.equipment
Class Burner

java.lang.Object
  ekshiksha.vclab.equipment.Equipment
      ekshiksha.vclab.equipment.Burner
All Implemented Interfaces:
EquipmentType, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
public class Burner
extends Equipment
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable

this class is responsible for equipment burner. this class can do the following:

  • initialization of burner.
  • drawing of burner.
  • creating flames.
  • showing flames with button.
  • showing flames automatically.

See Also:
